availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Keel Hall (Hickman County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, resident. Tennessee native. Son of Jonathan Hall. Married to Martha A. Winn Hall. Father of William Keel Hall Jr. and John Franklin Hall. Resident of Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Columbus, p. 1.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #9387.
Memorial Record of Western Kentucky, Vol. 1 (Chicago: Lewis Publishing Company, 1904), 168.
KYR-0001-003-0063.
